Title: Object: The Daughter of Admiral Walker
Series: Sir David Wilkie's Sketches in Turkey, Syria & Egypt, 1840 & 1841
Description: Portrait of a little girl in oriental dress, wearing a tall white headdress with a veil over her shoulders, a white sash around her waist, a skirt with broad fringed, embroidered panels over it and at her wrists, full length directed slightly to left, hands folded at the waist, looking towards the viewer. Hand-coloured lithograph printed in grey and beige
Curator's comments: From a set of lithographs 'Drawn on Stone by Joseph Nash', published in two volumes, London, 1843 and 1846 (1918,0205.2-8). See ODNB for Nash
Bibliographic references: Abbey Travel / Travel in Aquatint and lithography 1770-1860 from the library of J.R.Abbey (379.6)
Associated names: Associated with: Sir Baldwin Wake Walker
